messages.subject: Back to being a sword merchant...

messages.messageBody:
Hi All -

Back to being a peddler again. You might like to see a few things I've put on Ebay the last couple days. I believe some daisho fittings might find a new home. Not "high quality" fittings, but of darn nice quality. Check things out. Will be placing a few more items on early this week. (If link does not work, search under seller "sadakichi"...that's me.

http://tinyurl.com/344tp


Ron
STL



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
